author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a companion to https://github.com/cms-data/RecoTracker-TkSeedGenerator/pull/3 which updates the training for DeepCore using RUn-3 MC samples (the original training was done on 2017 MC).
This should reflect the updates in the Pixel conditions and tracking strategy with respect to Run2.

#### PR validation:

None.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

cc:
 @bouchamaouihichem
title: Update DeepCore training for Run-3
